FuncDef:
The suppress-reachability command suppresses the advertisement of all interface addresses in an OSPF process.
The undo suppress-reachability command restores the default setting. The suppress-reachability command suppresses the advertisement of all interface addresses in an OSPF process. The undo suppress-reachability command restores the default setting. By default, OSPF interfaces can advertise its addresses in the OSPF process.
